channel.title: How to get my iCloud samples to link up to auxy
channel.description: I have a new I pad and I’m trying bring my samples into the program and it will show it nd play it when I push it but when I Try to have it uploaded into the actual program is unable to load

item.title: How to get my iCloud samples to link up to auxy
item.dc:creator: Sidetrakt831
item.description:
Thank you I actually have AudioShare it’s not a matter of wav’s or anything it just won’t allow me to bring Files that I know work because I did it with my iPhone they just for some reason with my iPad that I just got won’t see them together so I was just wondering if maybe I had a setting offer or on that was keeping it from happening

Read full topic

item.title: How to get my iCloud samples to link up to auxy
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
https://auxy.co/samples.html

Lays it out pretty nicely. For wave files gotta be 20 secs or less and have to be 16bit. Will not import 32bit waves, or any other format that I’m aware.

Tools like the above or AudioShare are handy for converting

Read full topic
item.source: How to get my iCloud samples to link up to auxy

item.title: How to get my iCloud samples to link up to auxy
item.dc:creator: cjflash99
item.description:
There’s MP3 converter and also audio editor found for free on the App Store where you can copy / paste audio into it and you can then convert it into a WAV form which is needed for auxy samples.

It gives you an opportunity to add your own vocals too

App Store

‎Audio Editor - Music editor

‎[Audio Editor] A simple and powerful audio editing tool. It can complete the professional audio clips work easily on iPhone and iPad [Edit] - 「Splicing and sound mixing」: One-key switching; support free drag, easy to operate - 「 Recording 」:...
